text: The local villages provide a large supply of corpses perfect for the reanimation of zombie hordes.
A family crypt, guarded by the bones of loyal retainers who followed their magistrates into servitude beyond the grave.
The tomb of an entire dynasty, where the entombed bodies of ancient warriors and war machines wait until they are called upon in unlife.
A meeting chamber of like minded outcasts, dark sorcerers, necromancers and seekers of forbidden knowledge.
A fully formed conclave focusing on the ressurection of dark magic users and the instruction of neophytes in unholy rights.
